about_the_game:
Streets of Chaos is a new retro sidescroller beat em up (fighting game), made with pixelart similar to 16 bits consoles. Is highly based on Streets of Rage, Double Dragon, Final Fight, and Cadillacs and Dinosaurs, with original story and various homages to classics.

Story:


Franco is travelling the world to find his missing brother. Sgt. Manuel his friend from Brazil has clues about a guy that can be his brother. Franco joins Manuel and his friend Sophie in Brazil tryng to locate his missing brother. When he arrive in São Castelo, a fictional city in Brazil, he find a city envolved in crime and chaos.

Characters:


Franco: A well balanced fighter, he has mastered multiple martial arts, like Karate and Taekwondo. He is specialized in swords and is very good with all kind of weapons. A very calm person.

Sophie: A really fast and experienced warrior, treined in the streets. She is Ambidextrous, so she can do a lot a combos. Is the only character in game that can use 2 small weapons at same time (knifes, pistols, etc).
A hot blooded person.

Manuel: A very strong ex-military, that has mastered both boxe and capoeira, he is also very good in grabs. Manuel can use very big objects as weapons. He is very good with knifes and with all guns. A very eccentric person.

Game modes:

Story: semi-linear original story where you can play with Franco, Manuel and Sophie. You can try it with different dificultties, including the near impossible mode "Chaos".
Arcade: linear gameplay where you can play with every enemy in game (after you unlock it with game points).
Survival: try your best in multiples types of survival games, even one with Zombies.
Versus: You can beat your friends down.
Arena: A big arena with 2 teams with 16 vs 16. Who can win?
Soccer: A soccer game where you win if you survive.
Mini-games: challenge andfun mini-games, where you can earn poitns to unlock other characters to play with.
